scripts.build: pnpm run build:css && pnpm run copy-assets
scripts.copy-assets: pnpm dlx mkdirp dist && pnpm dlx copyfiles -u 0 "index.html" "404.html" ".htaccess" "tailwind.config.js" "dist/" && pnpm dlx copyfiles -u 0 "models/**/*" "applications/**/*" "about/**/*" "common/**/*" "dist/"
scripts.deploy: pnpm run clean && pnpm run build && pnpm run serve
scripts.build:prod: pnpm run build:css && pnpm run copy-assets
scripts.zip: pnpm run clean && pnpm run build:prod && pnpm dlx bestzip dist.zip dist/
